mapper.sql: USERS.USERNAME, USERS.PASSWORD, USERS.NAME, USERS.NICKNAME, USERS.PHONE, USERS.EMAIL, USERS.RESIDENT_NO AS residentNo, USERS.ADDRESS
mapper.select: SELECT TEAM.TEAM_ID AS teamId, NAME, CREATOR, ADDRESS FROM TEAM JOIN PARTICIPATION ON TEAM.TEAM_ID = PARTICIPATION.TEAM_ID WHERE PARTICIPATION.USERNAME = #{username}
SELECT TAG FROM HATE_TAG WHERE USERNAME = #{username} ORDER BY TAG
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (USERNAME, PASSWORD, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, NICKNAME, RESIDENT_NO, ADDRESS) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{residentNo}, #{address})
mapper.update: UPDATE USERS SET PASSWORD = #{password}, NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, EMAIL = #{email}, NICKNAME = #{nickname}, RESIDENT_NO = #{residentNo}, ADDRESS = #{address} WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HATE_TAG (HATE_TAG_ID, USERNAME, TAG) VALUES (Sequence_hate_tag.nextval, #{username}, #{tag})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM HATE_TAG WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND TAG = #{tag}
